actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Title (as it pertains to accumulated taxable corporate income) to provide for an increase in the accumulated earning credit.

summary.text: Provides for an increase, under the Internal Revenue Code, in the accumulated corporate earnings and profits credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Title (as it pertains to accumulated taxable corporate income) to provide for an increase in the accumulated earning credit.
